item.title: 'She's in a bad way': Neighbour's brave effort to save slain Auckland mum
item.description:
A neighbour of homicide victim Tania Hadley desperately tried to save the Auckland mum as her car went up in flames.
Hadley was found by emergency services with critical injuries on Friday morning and ...

item.title: A toll of 11: Inside the deadly Rosewood rest home cluster
item.description: It was the worst-case scenario that health officials were dreading â€“ the deadly coronavirus entering a rest home. The eleven deaths at Christchurch rest home Rosewood now accounts for the deadliest cluster ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/davidmeates_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Canterbury District Health Board (CDHB) chief executive David Meates.
